actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Commerce.

actions.subcommittee: Energy and Power, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Chairman
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Power, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Chairman.

official_title: To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of certain hydroelectric projects located in the State of West Virginia.

summary.text: Authorizes the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon licensee request, to extend for three consecutive two-year periods the time period required for commencement of construction of specified hydroelectric projects in the State of West Virginia.

titles.title: To extend the deadline for commencement of construction of certain hydroelectric projects located in the State of West Virginia.
